title: Yasuo Windwall should not come out of him
body:
It should appear at the location its cast in instead of coming out of him.

Im so sick of Yasuos using their windwall two seconds late but still blocking an ability just because of this dumb animation.

replies.body: this is nitpicking. This is not what makes Yasuo bullshit.

>This is not what makes Yasuo bullshit.

Its definently part of the bs tho
How is Yasuo supposed to block a point blank skillshot when dueling another melee then
The better question is how is he supposed to block point blank CC from champs like Ahri or Lux? He'd never be able to go onto those champs 1v1 if windwall didn't spawn inside his hitbox.
It's not like he had PLENTY of dashes to dodge skillshots or something. Even in lategame without minions waves he can just buy {{item:3139}}  and facetank the cc while murdering them anyway.

You can either dash onto the mage or you can dash to dodge skillshots. You can't do both. Of course you don't throw skillshots at Yasuo randomly when he's dashing around in a wave. That's laning against Yasuo 101. You wait for when he's dashing towards you and then nail him. The only reason this ever fails is because of wind wall. Baiting out the wall really isn't that hard is you're a smart mage player.
Except that if the Yasuo has half a brain he will save the wall for when he goes in so he can block {{champion:99}}  Q{{champion:103}}  E and etc.

Keeping that wall til the last second isn't that very hard for even the most stupid Yasuo player.

If a Yasuo dashes onto a mage, there's a high chance that it's in his favor and not the mage in question. Due to his shield, rapid stacking Q3 and a low ult cooldown, he could simply dash to the mage, spam Q until he gets the knock up and then ult to stick onto them. Panic wall when he sticks onto the mage and you're good to go against any CC that could potentially disrupt his onslaught.

The moment you aren't a threat to all in a ranged champ as Yasuo, you don't get to farm anymore. Why? Because you are a melee only champ with no escape. A ranged champ that knows you can't kill them is just going to stand in your minions and beat the shit out of you for ever daring to walk up. This is also why freezing a lane against a Yasuo is so effective. If he can't go onto you without being in tower range, he effectively can't trade with you and you can zone him as hard as you want.
